segments.text: Herman , why are you so excited ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have met a beautiful girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you describe the situation at that time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At that time her back was ramrod straight as she sailed by , her tone is best , neither over-passionate , nor too cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She was pretty , her hair was the color of rich dark chocolate , waving gently to her shoulders . Her complexion was clear and golden .
segments.speaker: S2
